title: Nocturne back at the end of Season 5?
body: Write what you think about Nocturne and if you think he's back tell us why ;){{champion:56}}

replies.body:
i dont think he was ever gone. 
Ofc, the recent Buffs give him some strength but his kit allows him to benefit of free Stats like AS and AD. Also he got one of the best Gapcloser/Catchups in the Game. 

I often see him with the Devourer Path but i think thats complete bullshit, since Cinderhulk and the new Items + his free Base Stats give him enough Steorids to brawl well even with Tanky Items.
